ComicInfo.Summary:
Fresh Blood: The Exiles are attacked by Hellblade who holds them responsible for the deaths of "Ground Zero."
Red Shift Exiles: While worrying about her past, Amber has a premonition about her future with the Phoenix.
ComicInfo.Title: Fresh Blood; Red Shift Exiles
